article_metadata.description: Photo credit: The world is spinning! By jetsandzeppelins via Flickr Government shutdown. Looming debt ceiling confrontation. Health care changes. It’s been a wild week in Washington, for sure, but for America’s 27 million privately held companies, it has had to be business as usual. That is, regardless of political debates or stock [...]
